Rijeka.title: Rijeka
Rijeka.byline: Rijeka (literally "River" in Croatian language) is a city in Kvarner Bay, a northern inlet of the Adriatic Sea in Croatia.

Rijeka Crnojevica.title: Rijeka Crnojevica
Rijeka Crnojevica.byline: Rijeka Crnojevica is a small historical town in Central Montenegro on the ancient trading route through Montenegro.

Rijswijk.title: Rijswijk
Rijswijk.byline: Rijswijk is a city in the province South Holland in the Netherlands.
